articles.title: Bubba Watson reportedly headed to LIV Golf, expected to debut at Boston-based event later this summer
articles.description: According to multiple reports, Bubba Watson will serve as one of the captains of LIV's four-man teams when he does begin to play on the tour over Labor Day weekend.

articles.title: Dallas Cowboys' Ezekiel Elliott not feeling pressure over contract, future with team
articles.description: Dallas Cowboys running back Ezekiel Elliott said he knows he faces a "big season" due to his contract situation with the team but said, "I think everything will handle itself."
articles.content:
OXNARD, Calif. -- With no guaranteed money on Ezekiel Elliott's contract beyond 2022, many wonder if this is his last year with the Dallas Cowboys.

articles.title: San Francisco 49ers release injury-plagued defensive end Dee Ford
articles.description: The San Francisco 49ers released defensive end Dee Ford, whose time with the franchise was derailed by a back injury.
articles.content:
SANTA CLARA, Calif. -- After three injury-plagued seasons, defensive end Dee Ford's time with the San Francisco 49ers is officially over.

articles.title: LB K.J. Wright retires as Seattle Seahawk after 11 NFL seasons
articles.description: Linebacker K.J. Wright has signed a one-day contract with the Seahawks to retire with the franchise for which he played 10 of his 11 NFL seasons.
articles.content:
RENTON, Wash. -- Veteran linebacker K.J. Wright signed a ceremonial one-day contract on Wednesday to retire as a member of the Seattle Seahawks, the team announced.

articles.description: Mike Trout is dealing with a "rare condition" in his back that he likely will have to manage "through the rest of his career," according to Angels head athletic trainer Mike Frostad.
